trigger.name: qBittorrent API Version Check
trigger.description: Checking to make sure the version of qBittorrent's API hasn't changed.

trigger.name: qBittorrent Version Check
trigger.description: Checking to make sure the version of qBittorrent hasn't changed.

trigger.name: CPU Utilization over 70%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization on device is running over 70% over a 5 minute period.

trigger.name: CPU Utilization over 80%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization on device is running over 80% over a 5 minute period.

trigger.name: CPU Utilization over 90%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization on device is running over 90% over a 5 minute period.

trigger.name: CPU Utilization over 98%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization on device is running over 98% over a 5 minute period.

trigger.name: VM is powered off
trigger.description: Data is reporting the device as powered off for the last 2 minutes. If this is expected, set the device in maintenance mode. If not, power on the device. This alert will auto resolve after getting 2 minutes of data showing a powered on state.

trigger_prototype.name: "{#SERVICE.NAME}" ({#SERVICE.DISPLAYNAME}) is not running (startup type {#SERVICE.STARTUPNAME})
trigger_prototype.description: The service has a state other than "Running" for the last three checks.

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of all guest file systems.

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 2% on {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Available drive storage has fallen below 2%. You do not need to manually close this item. Get on the device and return available storage to greater than 2% and the alert will auto resolve.

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 10% on {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Available drive storage has fallen below 10%. You do not need to manually close this item. Get on the device and return available storage to greater than 2% and the alert will auto resolve.

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 15% on {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Available drive storage has fallen below 15%. You do not need to manually close this item. Get on the device and return available storage to greater than 2% and the alert will auto resolve.

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 20% on {#FSNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Available drive storage has fallen below 20%. You do not need to manually close this item. Get on the device and return available storage to greater than 2% and the alert will auto resolve.

macro.value: ^RemoteRegistry|MMCSS|gupdate|SysmonLog|clr_optimization_v.+|clr_optimization_v.+|sppsvc|gpsvc|Pml Driver HPZ12|Net Driver HPZ12|MapsBroker|IntelAudioService|Intel\(R\) TPM Provisioning Service|dbupdate|DoSvc$

macro.description: VMware service (vCenter or ESX hypervisor) SDK URL (https://servername/sdk)
